page_description.description: A brief description of the page content.

page_structure.description: A JSON string representing the structure of the page, including forms and fields.

sidebar.description: A JSON string describing the sidebar content and its purpose.

sidebar_has_menu.description: Indicates whether the sidebar contains a menu.

streamlined_sidebar.description: A JSON string with standardized sidebar descriptions where similar sidebars are described with the same words.

migration_group.description: The migration group this page belongs to.
